title: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win 20 business-class flights to New York
text: La Compagnie is offering a select number of lucky readers the chance to fly business class from London (Luton) to New York (Newark) thanks to ten return tickets (London-New York) up for grabs. Offering winners the opportunity to experience award-winning all-business-class service between London Luton and Newark, New York, La Compagnie is focused on offering a value product for corporate and leisure customers alike; those that appreciate business class without the price tag. Operating out of London’s boutique airport, passengers flying with La Compagnie can enjoy premium check-in, priority security screening and lounge access. Flying into Newark means guests will be just 35 minutes from mid-town Manhattan, making La Compagnie the ideal airline whether visiting for business or leisure. How to enter Follow this link to tell us about your favourite travel companies and destinations - and to enter the draw for one of 27 prizes . You will need to leave your name, telephone number and a valid email address. See here for full terms and conditions . The prize French boutique business class airline, La Compagnie, is the brainchild of two leaders in the field of air travel – Frantz Yvelin and Peter Luethi – who believe that business class travel and personalised service can be offered at much more respectable fares than currently available. In creating La Compagnie, which has been operating flights from Paris Charles de Gaulle to New York since July 2014, the team have established an airline and level of high-end luxury service that meets the demands of today’s savvy, cost-conscious travellers. La Compagnie is for those who prefer a boutique-style flying experience. Those who want to enjoy an exclusive business class cabin at a smart price. Those eager to travel on fully connected planes that offer an innovative in-flight experience. La Compagnie is for those people looking for more freedom in business class. This French airline offers you something new: a 100% business class experience that’s more you on its flights to New York. With just 74 lie-flat seats on the whole plane, La Compagnie’s Boeing 757-200 is totally comfortable, totally connected and 100% business class. La Compagnie Aboard its innovative aircraft, wi-fi replaces paper: La Compagnie’s in-flight magazine is digital, its Samsung tablets allow for connectivity on demand. Previously operated by Icelandair, its Boeing 757-200 aircraft are known for their reliability, comfort and fuel efficiency. Lighter and smaller, it makes for pleasant transatlantic journeys. With just 19 rows and 74 seats, La Compagnie’s seats are in fixed shells offering passengers ultimate privacy and comfort. The seats recline to a 180 degree angle with built-in massage feature for added comfort during your journey, with seat configuration also designed as a personal work environment. Seats are equipped with reading lamp, compartments for personal items and electronics, an electrical outlet, headphone plug and pouch for documents. For convenience and wellbeing on board, La Compagnie provide anti-allergenic pillows, large, soft blankets and a Caudalie travel care kit, all free of charge. The cabin is equipped with LED lighting to offer passengers a warm atmosphere during their trip. La Compagnie’s price point is between 30-50% less expensive than other direct carriers offering a true business class service between London and New York. The airline offers the opportunity to experience award-winning all-bussiness-class service without the price tag. Operating out of London’s boutique airport, passengers can enjoy premium check-in, priority security screening, lounge access and a quick walk to the aircraft. In addition to this, guests fly into Newark, located just 35 minutes from mid-town Manhattan. This makes La Compagnie the ideal choice for the savvy traveller between these two great cities. Contact details: To book with La Compagnie please contact Aiden Walsh, VP of Sales UK at La Compagnie Boutique Arline: aiden.walsh@lacompagnie.com or visit www.lacompagnie.com for more information The prize provider La Compagnie is the brainchild of two leaders in the field of air travel – Frantz Yvelin and Peter Luethi – who believe that business class travel and personalised service can be offered at much more respectable fares than currently available. In creating La Compagnie, which has been operating flights from Paris Charles de Gaulle to New York since July 2014, the team have established an airline and level of high-end luxury service that meets the demands of today’s savvy, cost-conscious travellers. La Compagnie use redesigned Boeing 757-200 aircraft customised with stylish interiors and 74 lie-flat seats in a 2x2 configuration throughout a spacious, single aisle cabin. All seats will have personal Samsung Galaxy Pro 12” tablets, which can be removed from the seat backs, uploaded with an assortment of e-books, magazines, music and the latest movies. Passengers can look forward to in-flight amenity kits including cosmetic products from natural French skincare brand Caudalie, and delicious in-flight meals with seasonal menus created by French chef Christophe Langrée.
